greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} (k/gcd(n, k))^2.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} Sum_{k=1..d, gcd(k, d) = 1} k^2.
program: (MAGMA) [&+[(k div Gcd(n,k))^2:k in [1..n]]:n in [1..50]]; // _Marius A. Burtea_, Feb 18 2020
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Feb 18 2020
